product_name: Oh K!Hydrogel Eye Mask with Multi Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackOh K! Hydrogel Eye Mask is supercharged with hydration these under eye masks are infused with five different types of hyaluronic acid to quench dehydrated skin. These 5 HAs will protective our skin barrier to prevent moisture loss while helping to plump and smooth fine lines.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydratesPlumpsFeatures50% PCR BoxKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid - draws water from the air to hydrate the skin.Ceramides - helps to retain moisture and protect skin against environmental stressors.Item 2612744How To UsePlace a pair under the eyes on freshly cleansed skin, narrow side towards the nose and leave on for 15 minutes. Gently remove patches and pat the essence into the skin.IngredientsAqua (Eau, Water), Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cellulose Gum, Paeonia Suffruticosa Root Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Polyacrylate, Algin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Sucrose, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polysorbate 20, Adenosine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Silica, Trideceth-6, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Benzyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Raspberry Ketone, Disodium EDTA, Red 40 (CI 16035).
how_to_use: Place a pair under the eyes on freshly cleansed skin, narrow side towards the nose and leave on for 15 minutes. Gently remove patches and pat the essence into the skin.

reviews.headline: You Get What You Pay For
reviews.comments:
I dont know if I've actually ever done a review on Ulta without it being a produxt I received free of charge. 

I bought these half price and I can say why they are half price. I've used them twice and will prob attempt a third. Forget using the spatulat that comes with it to hygienically get them out of the jar. Never gonna happen. They slip all over. Which brings me to my next point. I'm sitting and every 30 secs or so, I have to slide the one eye mask that has a good amount of serum, back up to under my eye bc it just constantly slides down my face. I need masks where I can still do things, especially if they want you to leave them on for 30 mins. I leave all of my eye masks on for awhile when I can, but don't always have that extra time. I will say the other mask that I purposely chose w/o a lot of serum, hasn't, but the point is to have serum "soaked" masks. And idk if it would move while moving around- I can't do it bc of the other eye mask. 

I'd say that my eyes aren't dry after I take them off, but hydration isn't remarkable.

I've been crying a lot due to an important person in my life passing away, so I have been buying excessive amounts of eye masks.   

I would not purchase again even if the entire jar was $5.

reviews.headline: Nice but not substantial/sturdy
reviews.comments: Feels nice on my skin and each piece is nicely soaked in the gel liquid. However, the patches are pretty thin and don't stay in place. Throughout the 10-20 min period, they constantly slide down my face and I have to readjust them so they're right under my eyes. Gets pretty annoying after a while

reviews.headline: Nice but not substantial/sturdy
reviews.comments: Feels nice on my skin and each piece is nicely soaked in the gel liquid. However, the patches are pretty thin and don't stay in place. Throughout the 10-20 min period, they constantly slide down my face and I have to readjust them so they're right under my eyes. Gets pretty annoying after a while

reviews.headline: Love them! Won't use another brand!
reviews.comments: The jar comes with a bunch of masks. There is a lot of excess serum, which i love because they wont dry up in the case over time. After wearing a set until dry, under eyes have a more youthful, brightened, filled out appearance. I'll definitely purchase more.

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: this actually works pretty well for hydrating my undereyes. I'm about to buy my second one.

reviews.headline: A lot of masks for the price, but just ok
reviews.comments:
These are very hydrating, but the shape made it difficult to get very close to the lash line. Might be able to cut it but that seems like a lot of work. They also slide a lot, so you cant really stand up and use them. I will not
purchae again.

reviews.headline: really helped lines around my eyes.
reviews.comments: would recommend - loads of product in the pot... hydrates and helps to reduce the fine lines around my eyes.

reviews.headline: Very Hydrating
reviews.comments: There is a lot of serum inside the container, which I personally like. I like to put the patches on and rub whatever is left around the rest of my face. My skin feels very hydrated after I finish with this eye mask!

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: Really felt hydrated, it really plump my skin and helped with my fine lines.

reviews.headline: Great buy!
reviews.comments: Definitely would purchase again, stay in place well and moisturizing.

reviews.headline: Don't stay in place at all, bad shape
reviews.comments:
These are somewhat hydrating, but no more so than reusable silicone eye masks paired with literally any hydrating serum or moisturizer. 

However they dont come close to fitting under my eyes. The cut out that is supposed to fit under you eyes is like a half circle. Unless your eyes are small and perfectly round balls, these will absolutely not fit correctly. I can realy only get these on my upper cheeks and outer crows feet area.. not under my eyes where i need the hydration. 

And they slide around so much. There is so much serum on them, plus the masks are so thin, that they will move from where you put them for the first 5-10 minutes, until they start to dry. Annoying. 

I'll go back to my reusable ones after i finish these up

reviews.headline: Best thing ever
reviews.comments: One day I woke up and I tried these. Best. Decision. Ever. I am. Obsessed. You need these. I am illuminating beauty.

reviews.headline: This really did de-puff my eyes
reviews.comments: Such value for money. Really works.

reviews.headline: Exciting NEW Products
reviews.comments: Love this brand. Always the best Korean Skin Care products.  Cant wait to try the new milti-masking.

reviews.headline: So hydrating and fresh!
reviews.comments: These masks feel so refreshing and cooling on my skin and the next day my eyes looked so much more awake than normal! Will definitely be buying again

faceoff_positive.comments: The jar comes with a bunch of masks. There is a lot of excess serum, which i love because they wont dry up in the case over time. After wearing a set until dry, under eyes have a more youthful, brightened, filled out appearance. I'll definitely purchase more.

rollup.name: Hydrogel Eye Mask with Multi Hyaluronic Acid
